Introduction
This topic contains general information on determinations of FPOW status, including
definition of FPOW
circumstances comparable to prisoner of war (POW) detainment
reason for detention or internment
assumption that forcible detention occurred in the line of duty
holding claimants to the same standards of evidence
accepting service department findings on FPOW status
required administrative decisions on FPOW status
, and
declared enemies of the U.S. and periods of hostilities
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section A - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section A
